body: please provide a CSB and i will take a look at it.

I'm seeing this problem too with a controlled component. 
setError and clearErrors are not correctly updating the formState.errors for the component.
could I have a reproduceable codesandbox @NickR49 ?
if you guys can help reproduce: https://codesandbox.io/s/romantic-maxwell-svxvp?file=/src/App.js (couldn't reproduce on @NickR49's statement)

The regression I am seeing can be viewed at https://codesandbox.io/s/summer-shape-rvkq8?file=/src/App.js.

In 7.1.1 You could enter a value and click submit and the form would correctly show NOT DIRTY(after a reset).
In 7.2.1 When you submit and `reset` is called the `isDirty` value is still true

issue.title: reset isDirty regression

repository.name: react-hook-form
repository.description: ðŸ“‹ React Hooks for form state management and validation (Web + React Native)

issue.body:
The regression I am seeing can be viewed at https://codesandbox.io/s/summer-shape-rvkq8?file=/src/App.js.

In 7.1.1 You could enter a value and click submit and the form would correctly show NOT DIRTY(after a reset).
In 7.2.1 When you submit and `reset` is called the `isDirty` value is still true

_Originally posted by @anark in https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form/issues/4865#issuecomment-823319874_

body:
> The regression I am seeing can be viewed at https://codesandbox.io/s/summer-shape-rvkq8?file=/src/App.js.
> 
> In 7.1.1 You could enter a value and click submit and the form would correctly show NOT DIRTY(after a reset).
> In 7.2.1 When you submit and `reset` is called the `isDirty` value is still true

Thanks, fixing that.

> Refresh the CSB a few times and sometimes the error shows correctly and sometimes it doesn't

Thanks @NickR49. can you define what's not working in more detail? so the error is not clearing? or state is not updated.

@bluebill1049 Sorry for the delay, I managed to reproduce in a CSB https://codesandbox.io/s/condescending-volhard-3xj87 

Submit with an empty field, the field turns to error state. Type-in some characters, the error state does not automatically reset.
If you change the version of RHF to 7.1.1 it resets.

I'm a bit confused now by our call to clearErrors that might not be required at all, but that's another story :/

David

> @bluebill1049 Sorry for the delay, I managed to reproduce in a CSB https://codesandbox.io/s/condescending-volhard-3xj87
> 
> Submit with an empty field, the field turns to error state. Type-in some characters, the error state does not automatically reset.

oh! i see. thanks!
